about_the_game:
Soundtrack created especially for the game Cinemoji. This soundtrack has 5 references to famous movie soundtracks. Can you find them all and can you tell which movies they are?

Buy this soundtrack and enjoy it on your computer at any time.

Includes an original soundtrack for the game Cinemoji.

The soundtrack can be purchased independently of the game.

name: Cinemoji Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 50 MB available space
